name: Hadag Nahash
description: '''Hadag Nahash''' ({{langx|he|הדג נחש}} ''{{Transliteration|he|ha-Dag Nachash}}'', {{IPA|he|(h)aˈdaɡ naˈχaʃ|}}) is an [[Israel]]i [[hip hop music|hip hop]] and [[funk]] band, founded in 1996 in Jerusalem, which makes [[political statement]]s in many of its [[protest song]]s.
